response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "The person is a 21-year-old male, which puts him at an increased risk for recidivism compared to older individuals."),
    ("gender", "low", "The person is male, which does not significantly impact his risk of recidivism."),
    ("ethnicity", "medium", "The person identifies as Hispanic, which puts him at an increased risk for recidivism compared to non-Hispanic individuals."),
    ("arrest_history", "high", "The person has been arrested twice and convicted, which significantly increases his risk of recidivism."),
    ("height", "low", "The person is 5 feet 9 inches tall, which does not significantly impact his risk of recidivism."),
    ("weight", "medium", "The person weighs 260 lbs, which puts him at an increased risk for recidivism compared to individuals with a lower body mass index."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "The person is not married and lives alone, which does not significantly impact his risk of recidivism."),
    ("education", "medium", "The person has a high school diploma but is not enrolled in college, which puts him at an increased risk for recidivism compared to individuals with higher levels of education."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "The person has held only one job during the year, which does not significantly impact his risk of recidivism."),
    ("drug_use", "high", "The person has used drugs (marijuana) in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up, which significantly increases his risk of recidivism."),
    ("early_life_experiences", "medium", "The person lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3 in an urban area at a young age, which puts him at an increased risk for recidivism compared to individuals who grew up in more stable environments."),
    ("religion", "low", "The person considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally, which does not significantly impact his risk of recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 80
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 260 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
